title: Fix mobile header text sizing, merge Jump Start into Vehicle Recovery, and fix chatbot form button

requirements.text: Resize the 'ETHOS Towing & Recovery' text in the Header component for mobile viewports so it fits properly within the available header area without overflowing or being cut off

quotes: in the mobile version ETHOS Towing & Recovery doesnt properly fit the area, resize the text so it can fit properly

acceptanceCriteria: Company name text displays fully within mobile header bounds
Text is legible and properly sized for mobile screens
No horizontal scrolling or text overflow on mobile devices
Text size adjusts responsively for different mobile viewport widths

requirements.text: Remove Jump Start Service as a separate seventh service card from the Services component and incorporate jump start assistance into the Vehicle Recovery service description, renaming the Vehicle Recovery service to 'Vehicle Recovery & Jump Start' or similar appropriate title

quotes: don't make jump start a seperate service incoporate it in vehicle recovery section rename it if needed

acceptanceCriteria: Services component displays six service cards instead of seven
Vehicle Recovery service card includes jump start assistance in its description
Service card title reflects the inclusion of jump start services (e.g., 'Vehicle Recovery & Jump Start')
Jump Start Service no longer appears as a standalone service card
Service grid layout remains balanced with six cards

requirements.text: Fix the chatbot 'Fill out form' suggestion button functionality so that clicking or tapping it properly opens/displays the contact form on all devices including mobile

quotes: if we tap fill out form in the chatbot it does not come out fix it

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking 'Fill out form' button in chatbot successfully scrolls to or reveals the contact form

Contact form becomes visible and accessible after button tap

No console errors occur when the button is clicked

quotes: don't make jump start a seperate service incoporate it in vehicle recovery section

acceptanceCriteria: Chatbot responses list six services instead of seven
Vehicle Recovery service description mentions jump start assistance
